title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.12 - Persons to whom tickets may not be issued and entry shall be denied
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.12 - Persons to whom tickets may not be issued and entry shall be denied

State Regulations

The Commission may direct that any person whose license has
been revoked or suspended by the Commission for conduct detrimental to the best
interests of boxing or mixed martial arts shall not be issued a ticket for, or
be admitted to or remain at, any professional boxing or professional mixed
martial arts contest or exhibition within the State of New York. Any such
person found in attendance at any boxing or mixed martial arts contest or
exhibition may be removed therefrom. Notes

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
